name: ITP - G1202A - Waikaretaheke Overslip #3 - Rock Armouring & Bulk Filling
template name: ITP - G1202A - Waikaretaheke Overslip #3 - Rock Armouring & Bulk Filling

name: Detail - Set out lateral extents of buttress. Geotech Engineer to confirm extent of works
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Fault ID 530 - Underslip Recovery Remediation Design Report

Detail - The buttress slope face angle should be 2H:1V. The buttress slope face angle may be steepened to no more than 1.5H:1V if required by site constraints, at Geotechnical Site Engineer's discretion
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Fault ID 530 - Underslip Recovery Remediation Design Report
Detail - Excavation only to start once ESC in place as per ESC ITP. Inspect fill foundation.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Inspection by the Geotechnical Design Manager
Conformance Criteria - Fill foundation must be approved, in writing, before filling commences
Detail - Foundation compliance. May be performed by site engineer or CPS as is specifically only for ground strength data for future review.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Scala Penetrometer
Conformance Criteria - >= 1 test per 10 linear metres, where access is practical and available
Records - Engineer or Lab Test Report
Detail - Material to meet specifications dependant on material type selected
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing
Conformance Criteria - D50 OF 450 WITH A MINIMUM SPECIFIC GRAVITY (SG) OF 2,350kg/m3
Detail - Back Face Geotextile - Rolls delivered and delivery dockets gathered. Compliant with Bidim A39 (Class D) or similar
Frequency - Prior to commencement of placement
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Detail - Between Rock Armour and bulk fill Geotextile - Rolls delivered and delivery dockets gathered. Compliant with Bidim A49 (Class E) or similar
Frequency - Prior to commencement of placement
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Lab Testing - OMC Standard Compaction; Grading Curve (wet sieve)
Conformance Criteria - All bulk fill comprising clean graded granular aggregate with broken faces AP65 (i.e. gravel).
Detail - Ensure that geotextile is placed as detailed in Specifications/Drawings with the required laps.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Engineered bulk construction material 250mm lifts with material and regular compaction testing
Frequency - 1 test per 10m linear length (forming a test set). At least 1 test set every 2m fill height (minimum total of 3 evenly spaced test set intervals over total height of bulk fill).
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Testing - NDM (required), supplemented with Clegg Hammer tests at discretion of site engineer.
Conformance Criteria - 95% of MDD or clegg equivalent
Detail - Ensure that the Engineered fill embankment is constructed to at least the finished height of the embankment protection rip rap
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - ALL BULK FILL MATERIAL SHOULD COMPRISE CLEAN GRADED GRANULAR AGGREGATE AND HAVE BROKEN FACES AP65 OR SIMILAR MATERIAL.
Detail - Ensure that geotextile is placed as detailed in Specifications/Drawings with the required laps.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection

Detail - Ensure that placement of rock material is placed in such a manner to minimise segregation and avoid displacement of underlying materials. Oversize rock to be placed such to minimise voids. Design Engineer given notice to visually inspect initial placement of riprap material
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual inspection
Detail - Ensure drainage swales are insatlled to tie in with existing swales to esnure drainage flows correctly
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Visual Inspection
Conformance Criteria - Fault ID 530 - Underslip Recovery Remediation Design Report
Detail - Red line mark up drawings to be reviewed and accepted. All NCRs and RFIs are closed and included with Handover QA file.
Inspection / Test Method submission, visual inspection, testing, measure, review - Document Review. Red line mark up notes of design plan.
Conformance Criteria - Ensure all QA is uploaded into ConQA / Procore
17 - Completion Sign Off From Fields Below
